title: Realizing high-performance thermoelectric module through enhancing power factor via optimizing carrier mobility in n-type PbSe crystals
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00433G, Paper
Siqi Wang, Yi Wen, Shulin Bai, Zhe Zhao, Yichen Li, Xiang Gao, Qian Cao, Cheng Chang, Li-Dong Zhao
The limited availability of Te poses challenges for the widespread application of Bi2Te3-based thermoelectric modules. In this work, we explored the thermoelectric module potential of Te-free PbSe by elevating its...
